channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Temporary signs block junction visibility, 17th January
item.description:
Temporary signs have gone up that block visibility in both directions when crossing the A road. Very dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cross hatch box is too worn, 17th January
item.description:
Cross hatch box by St John's Church and Parton Road is so worn you can't see it and people keep blocking the junction
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: From flooding a couple of weeks ago, 17th January
item.description:
Mud now cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary Traffic lights need to repositioned, 17th January
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights are there (thank goodness) ahead of the horrendous potholes being repaired. However, there is one very big pothole on the left as you drive up the hill just after the traffic lights. It is unavoidable because the cars coming down the hill are waiting at the lights, meaning there is not enough space to pass it. If the lights could be repositioned so as you drive down the hill, you approach the lights about 10 metres earlier, this would make a huge difference and avoid any more damage to cars. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
